name: Floki the Boatbuilder
description:
Floki the Boatbuilder is a viking who embarks on a journey to sail to Iceland, a land he claims to be "the land of the gods". But suddenly, a monstrous storm hits his boat and causes it to crash into an island that is ruled by Saxons.

These Saxons are dangerous, and they will kill Floki on sight! So Floki must find a tree to chop it up and use to help fix his boat so he can escape from this island, and continue to sail on his journey to Iceland. However, what he finds on this island that is ruled by Saxons may be something that would change his life...
